item.description:
Radisson Nashua SINGLES DANCE
Friday, June 18th.
8:00 PM to 1 am.

The Radisson formally the Sheraton Tara
spit brook rd
exit 1, off of rt.3
Nashua, NH 03061
603-938-5695
Proper attire is required! No jeans or sneakers, no work boots.

Please join Steve O. and 20 to 80 friends for an evening of dancing and socializing. This is the largest Singles Dances in NH, with between 200 and 300 singles, in a ballroom setting. Meet and dance with the most tasteful variety of people and ages you will find anywhere. Because of the popularity of this Dance. Tables and seats will be hard to hold much past 8:30. Plus, the Cover Charge goes from $10 to $12 after 9 pm. So, please get there as close to 8 pm as possible. So, you can meet some new people as Steve O. introduces you to everyone at our tables. Also, ask where Steve O. or Meetup is sitting as you pay at the door. They will show you where our tables are.
Host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
www.togethernh.com/singlesevents.html
item.how_to_find_us: go to the left when you come in, look for meetup signs

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dance at the Radison in Nashua, NH
